mapper.select: SELECT ( ID, INTEREST_DATA_CATEGORY, INTEREST_DATA_TYPE, INTEREST_DATA_SECTION, INTEREST_DATA_VALUE, INTEREST_DATA_CONTENT, INTEREST_DATA_IMG_NAME, INTEREST_DATA_IMG_PATH ) FROM TBL_INTEREST_DATA

SELECT TBD.ID, TBD.INTEREST_DATA_CATEGORY, TBD.INTEREST_DATA_TYPE, TBD.INTEREST_DATA_SECTION, TBD.INTEREST_DATA_VALUE, TBD.INTEREST_DATA_CONTENT, TBD.INTEREST_DATA_IMG_NAME, TBD.INTEREST_DATA_IMG_PATH FROM TBL_INTEREST_DATA TBD JOIN TBL_INTEREST_DETAIL TBID ON TBD.INTEREST_DATA_SECTION = TBID.INTEREST_DETAIL_SECTION AND TBD.INTEREST_DATA_VALUE = TBID.INTEREST_DETAIL_VALUE JOIN TBL_INTEREST TBI ON TBID.INTEREST_ID = TBI.ID WHERE TBI.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_INTEREST_DATA SET INTEREST_DATA_CATEGORY = #{interestDataCategory}, INTEREST_DATA_TYPE = #{interestDataType}, INTEREST_DATA_SECTION = #{interestDataSection}, INTEREST_DATA_VALUE = #{interestDataValue}, INTEREST_DATA_CONTENT = #{interestDataContent}, INTEREST_DATA_IMG_NAME = #{interestDataImgName}, INTEREST_DATA_IMG_PATH = #{interestDataImgPath}
